mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment (comment_no, comment_content, user_no, comment_date, board_no, category_no) VALUES (board_comment_seq.nextval, #{commentContent}, #{userNo}, sysdate, #{boardNo}, #{categoryNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.comment_no, a.comment_content, a.comment_date, a.board_no, a.category_no, b.user_nick FROM board_comment a, users b WHERE a.board_no = #{boardNo} AND a.category_no = #{categoryNo} AND a.user_no=b.user_no ORDER BY comment_no
